a.name: A. Get to the Ship
a.imagePath: vassal_extracted/images/mission-cards/Mos Eisley Outskirts-A-Get to the Ship.png
a.setup: A figure can interact with a launch panel to flip the token Green side up or gray side up. Each player can flip a maximum of 1 token per round.
a.endOfRound: Each player gains 5 VPs for each green launch panel they control and 2 VPs for each gray launch panel they control.

b.name: B. Smuggled Goods
b.setup: A figure can retrieve contraband as a free action. Apply -2 Speed to each figure carrying contraband.
b.endOfRound: Each player gains 15 VPs for each of their figures carrying contraband in their deployment zone. Then discard those tokens.

a.name: Local Trouble
a.setup:
Thugs are hostile to all figures except other thugs.
A figure can attack a thug (Health: 4, Defense: 1 black die)
a.endOfRound:
Move each thug 2 spaces to the closest hostile figure. Then, each hostile figure adjacent to a thug suffers 2 Damage. (If multiple hostile figures are tied for closest to the thug, then the player with Initiative decides which figure is targeted.)
The player who controls the Cantina gains 6 VPs.

b.name: Sabacc Standoff
b.startOfRound: The player with the Initiative places 1 token next to the Cantina for each Command card in their hand.
b.endOfRound: Until the end of the next round, the player who controls the Sabacc table is considered to have 1 additional VP for each token next to the Cantina.
